The sequence begins $1,2,3,4,6,7,8,9,10,13$. What is the $500,000$th number in the sequence?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 996,506\qquad\textbf{(B)}\ 996507\qquad\textbf{(C)}\ 996508\qquad\textbf{(D)}\ 996509\qquad\textbf{(E)}\ 996510 $
